column4: i just installed a fresh copy of ubuntu. updates ran and installed compiz fusion etc. rebooted. how do i now turn it on and check out the prettiness?
then you should have something fancy to look at ;) You can also customize the effects, but you need to install a package for it. I don't remember what it was, though
where though? running firefox etc i dont see any magic happening. i want to see spinning cubes and shit on fire and chrome spheres on checkerboards
